name: Task Donegeon 2.0 - 0.5.49 - Math Muncher Gameplay Polish
description: This update implements significant improvements to the 'Math Muncher' minigame based on user feedback. Troggle (enemy) movement is now more dynamic and less predictable. A clearer, longer animation and a brief game pause now occur when the player is hit, improving visual feedback. The logic for selecting different troggle types has been fixed to ensure a proper variety of enemies appear. The spawn rate for in-game power-ups has also been increased.
